alert.note: Alert for Knott (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 7:46AM EDT until July 28 at 8:30AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, Breathitt, Knott, Owsley and Perry. * WHEN...Until 145 PM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 743 AM EDT, Heavy rainfall during the night and early morning is resulting in ongoing flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Booneville, Buckhorn, Whick, Little, Saldee, Wolf Coal, Copland, Howard Creek, Altro, Bush Branch, Barwick, Haddix, Curt, Canoe, Beech, Watts, Talbert, Lost Creek, Crockettsville and Sebastian`s Branch. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
